info.title: OCR AI API
info.description: API for submitting documents (images or PDFs) for asynchronous OCR and data extraction.

post.description: Upload one or more files. The server will start a background job and return a task ID. Use the status_url to poll for completion.

parameters.name: doc_type
parameters.description: A hint for the document type (e.g., 'Passport', 'Visa'). Optional.

parameters.name: files
parameters.description: One or more files (images or PDFs) to process.

get.summary: Check the status of a processing task

parameters.name: task_id
parameters.description: The ID of the task returned by the /extract endpoint.

200.description: Current status of the task. The 'state' will be 'SUCCESS' when done, and the 'result' will contain the database ID of the processed document.
